item.title: [Python] Create a TwitterBot with Python!
item.description: ## What is TwitterBot? Bot is the etymology of Robot, and refers to something that automatically does something. On Twitter Auto Tweet Bot Auto Like Bot Auto follow bot There are various bots. What are the benefits of Bot? Automatic Tweets act like notifications. For example, “we tweet automatically when the live information of your favorite artist is updated”. Auto Like and Auto Follow serve as a tool to let an unspecified number of people know your account.

item.title: [Python] I tried MindMeld for the first time
item.description: This article was posted as the 10th day of the Cisco Systems Japan Advent Calendar 2019 by Cisco colleagues. Click here for past calendars 2017 edition: https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2017/cisco -> Distribute policy tag with LISP, tried TrustSec with CML/VIRL 2018 version: https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2018/cisco -> I tried using Cisco’s SaaS monitoring and behavior detection tool for multi-cloud environment monitoring This year, the 3rd year since joining the company (Advent Calendar has also participated for 3 consecutive years!
